dcterms:description: A dataset providing an overview, models, and system-level evaluation of 3GPP NR V2X Mode 2, which is suitable for vehicle-to-vehicle communication.
dcterms:title: 3GPP NR V2X Mode 2

dcterms:creator: L. Cao
H. Yin
R. Wei
L. Zhang
dcterms:description: A dataset that optimizes semi-persistent scheduling in NR-V2X from an age-of-information perspective, focusing on reducing collision probability in vehicle communications.
dcterms:title: Semi-Persistent Scheduling (SPS)

dcterms:creator: M. Rauchs

dcterms:description: A conceptual framework for distributed ledger technology systems, providing insights into multi-party systems operating without a central authority.
dcterms:title: Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT)

dcterms:creator: L. Cao
H. Yin
dcterms:description: A dataset focusing on resource allocation for vehicle platooning in 5G NR-V2X using deep reinforcement learning techniques.
dcterms:title: Resource allocation for vehicle platooning

dcterms:creator: L. Cao
S. Roy
H. Yin
dcterms:description: A dataset that models, analyzes, and optimizes resource allocation in 5G platoon communication, focusing on improving communication efficiency.
dcterms:title: Resource allocation in 5G platoon communication

dcterms:creator: A. Dayal
V. K. Shah
B. Choudhury
V. Marojevic
C. Dietrich
J. H. Reed
dcterms:description: A dataset that introduces adaptive semi-persistent scheduling for enhanced on-road safety in decentralized V2X networks.
dcterms:title: Adaptive semi-persistent scheduling

dcterms:creator: L. Cao
H. Yin
dcterms:description: A dataset that presents a blockchain-empowered communication scheme for vehicular safety applications, enhancing the safety of vehicle platooning.
dcterms:title: Blockchain-empowered platoon communication scheme
